title: How to Set SMART Financial Goals

sections.heading: Why SMART Goals?
sections.body: They're Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-bound for maximum success in personal finance.

sections.heading: How to Implement
sections.body: Define each goal in detail, assign a timeline, and break into monthly action steps.

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.

title: Monthly Budgeting Techniques for Every Salary

sections.heading: Zero-Based Budgeting
sections.body: Assign every rupee a purpose before spending begins each month.

sections.heading: The 50-30-20 Rule
sections.body: Allocate 50% to needs, 30% to wants, and 20% to savings and investments.
